children.text: There are visible scratches/chips in the shower base that need to be removed.
s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 18.02 Faults and damage to appliances and fittings states that
‘Damage to appliances and fittings supplied as part of the building contract is defective if it is due to the builder’s workmanship’ .
This shower base will need to be replaced or repaired in accordance with above.
